SRFDescription: Supreme Ruler Ultimate Trainer with lots of option
SRFHelp:
[Country]
List of domestic/country/diplomatic information, 
such as treasury, gdp/etc

[Resources]
Contain resource stock,
there will be Market Price, Market Production Cost
Output efficiency


[Warfare]
Warfare are consist of 2 types of Editing object,

1. Unit (Selected Unit)
Modifying this value will only change unit stat of the unit u select, upon removal of selection, the unit will not be tracker

2. Unit (Stat of selected Unit [Warfare Editor]), 
Modifying this value will change the unit original stat.

[Warfare: Calculated option]
-Heal - will heal the current selected unit to actual state form.
-Rambo - Unit morale/eff/exp overload.
-GasSupply2x - Unit current fuel/supply multiplied by 2
-GasSupply4x - Unit current fuel/supply multiplied by 4
-Str2x - Unit current strength Multiplied by 2
-Str4x - Unit current strength Multiplied by 4

[Warfare: Persistent]
A List to track godmode unit

[Warfare: Modified]
A List to revert/change global modified unit back to original value

[Special]
Click Day option
- 1 Day Research, Go to research Tab > Select/Hover on queue to complete the selected research
- 1 Day Army, Go to defense production > Building X / X
- 1 Day Build, Go to land tab, select the building you want to complete (this will not affect AI)

[Special: Facilities]
This are not yet implemented, it will contain specific building variables to change (AI Affected), supply level etc.

Categories.description: 1 day build, missile multiplier, sat com
